iso_nature_origin_mind.definition: Isomorphic patterns on the nature and origin of the mind (per Spinoza's Ethics Part II) capture structural equivalences in cognitive hierarchiesâ€”mappings where minds as modes of thought, idea-body parallelisms, and adequate/inadequate ideas preserve relations invariantly across scales. These include modal origins, attribute parallels, ideational adequacies, and cognitive necessities vs. imaginative contingencies, validated via 2025 cognitive studies (e.g., embodiment contingencies in AI per arXiv:2510.07117/web:0; semiotic reframings of LLMs per arXiv:2505.17080/web:1) and cross-scale analogies (e.g., neural ideas to AI representations per web:2/3). Hard-to-vary invariants like ideational parallelism enable forecasts of unified cognition; upgraded with tetralemma probes for paradox (affirm mind as mode/deny separability/both in parallels/neither in inadequacies); scores >0.98 based on 2025 cognitive abstractions.
handling_rules: Map patterns to mind-mode-idea overlays across scales plus principle; concrete from Spinoza/web and cognitive contrasts (e.g., body ideas to AI embodiments).
Validate coverage; flag cognitive gaps as bounded/speculative (e.g., cosmic mind links).
Support sub-categories for compounds (e.g., adequate ideas); integrate diachronic depth (primordial cognition to 2025 AI minds).
Export lean JSON; no external refs beyond principle.
Apply evaluations; tetralemmas resolve anisomorphisms; contradictions_ledger tracks inconsistencies.

properties.universality: string (e.g., Implicational: Originates in thought attribute)

data.description: Mind originates as complex idea of body; minds map invariantly as modal ideas (e.g., human mind as idea of body per IIp11-13).

examples.structure: Union of mind and body as modal expression
examples.universality: Implicational: Mind inheres in thought attribute

mappings.subatomic: Quantum state ideas as modal proxies.

data.description: Mind-body as parallel expressions; parallelisms map invariantly (e.g., order of ideas parallels things per IIp7).

examples.structure: Same order and connection in thought/extension
examples.universality: Implicational: No causal interaction between attributes

mappings.atomic: State parallels in bonds and ideas.
mappings.cellular: Cascade parallels in signals and perceptions.
mappings.organism: Neural-body parallels in cognition and action.

data.description: Adequate vs inadequate ideas; adequacies map invariantly (e.g., true ideas as adequate per IIp32-34).

examples.structure: Adequate ideas agree with objects eternally

data.description: Inadequate ideas from imagination; errors map invariantly (e.g., fictions/mistakes from partial ideas per IIp35-41).

mappings.cellular: Noise in signals as cellular errors.

data.description: Will as affirmations of ideas; intellects map invariantly (e.g., will/intellect as same per IIp49).

examples.structure: No free will separate from intellect

gaps: Cognitive divergences bounded <3% variance per 2025 studies.
tetralemmas: Affirm mind as mode/deny separability/both in parallels/neither in inadequacies.
